review: I have just bought this because it's the best option ever, I'm from Dominican Republic and here a HDMI cable may cost like 25 or 30 USD, and you have to keep your devices attached to the TV, and it's not the same because the Cable would only allow you to stream your device screen.  The chromecast gives you a lot of options, I'm always learning something new that this thing can do. BEST PURCHASE EVER!

review: Works amazing...the quality is super good and the setup was easy and painless.  At first I had an issue with my TV flickering during playback and thought the Chromecast wouldn't work, but I switched it to a different HDMI port and it worked flawlessly.  Getting another one for my other TV.

review: It's okay, but I'm not happy with it.  Broadcasting your desktop (on 8/23/14) is experimental and does not support sound.  So, video without sound.  Sure, you can probably set up the sound in some other way (wire it directly, perhaps?), but then it won't sync with the video.  Forgot to mention the video is noticeably delayed.  Fairly unhappy with this device and the purchase in general.
